Package com.topdesk.cases.toprob

Interface Solution

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    YourSolution
    public interface Solution
    A solution to find a safe path from the room to the kitchen and back.

    Instances should provide a void (no arguments) constructor.

    Instances of implementations of this interface are immutable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Instruction> solve​(Grid grid, int time)
      Finds a path from the room to the kitchen and back.

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        java.util.List<Instruction> solve​(Grid grid,
                                  int time)
        Finds a path from the room to the kitchen and back. After the last move Rob should be in his room. The solution is at most 100 instructions, i.e. the size of the returned List is smaller than or equal to 100. This solution is not guaranteed to be the shortest path.

        Rob starts his journey at the given time in his room.

        Parameters:
        grid - the grid to find a solution for
        time - the time that Rob starts his journey. This value is bigger than or equals to zero
        Returns:
        a List with all instructions
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if grid is null
